::Spears::

"Yeah, I suppose your right. I guess I just lost my temper.  I 
suppose I should appologize for it then." She chuckled,"But I did 
like the face that Unitron made like ' WHAT KIND OF CRAZY MAXIMAL IS 
THIS?'"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus takes the hand, shaking it. "Ramhorn wouldn't have lived if 
we opened 
> fire, and that would be two Maximals dead, instead of zero. I've 
never seen 
> someone scream at a Predacon with a hostage, though..."
> 
> He was still a bit surprised at Spears' action in the hostage 
situation. To 
> him, it was a dumb way of resolving things, but maybe it could'ave 
worked.
